amendment.description: Amendments increase funding for the SAFER program by $50 million for grants to fire and EMS departments.
amendment.purpose: An Amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to appropriate $50 million to the Staffing for Adequate Fire and Emergency Response Firefighters (SAFER) Program, which provides grants to help hire, recruit, and retain career and volunteer firefighters in departments that are operating below departmental, community, and national standards.

action.text: On agreeing to the Weldon (PA) amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
